dot.description: Whether to display a small red dot in the upper right corner of the icon
dot.description_zh: 是否显示图标右上角小红点

badge.description: The contents of the logo in the upper right corner of the icon
badge.description_zh: 图标右上角徽标的内容

:badge-props.description: Customize the properties of the logo, and the incoming object will be transparently passed to [Badge component's props](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/badge#props)
:badge-props.description_zh: 自定义徽标的属性，传入的对象会被透传给 [Badge 组件的 props](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/badge#props)

size.description: Icon sizes, such as '20px' '2em', have the default unit of px
size.description_zh: 图标大小，如 `20px` `2em`，默认单位为 px

class-prefix.description: A class name prefix to use a custom icon
class-prefix.description_zh: 类名前缀，用于使用自定义图标

tag.description: The HTML tag name corresponding to the root node
tag.description_zh: 根节点对应的 HTML 标签名

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the icon is clicked
